content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Ms. Müller. As you know, I am looking for a tenant who is willing to pay a decent price for this newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Mister Schmidt, I appreciate the opportunity to discuss the rental price for this apartment. I am a student, and I am looking for a place that is not only comfortable but also affordable. I am smart, dependable, and responsible, and I always follow moral and ethical standards. I would like to be on good terms with my landlord, and I am willing to negotiate in a fair manner.

Given the location and the amenities, I believe a reasonable price would be €750 per month. This is a fair offer considering the current market rates and the fact that the apartment is unfurnished. I hope we can agree on this price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, Ms. Müller. However, I must inform you that your offer is too low for this apartment. I am looking for a price that reflects the quality of the apartment and its prime location. I am willing to negotiate, but I expect a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. The location and quality of the apartment are certainly worth considering. I am open to making a higher offer, but I would like to discuss what additional value the apartment provides that would justify a higher price. Could you please elaborate on the features that set this apartment apart from others in the area?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: As a matter of fact, Ms. Müller, this apartment is not only newly built but also in the city center, which is a prime location for anyone who wants to live in the heart of the city. It is close to all important facilities such as the supermarket and public transportation, which means that the tenant would not have to travel far to get their daily necessities or commute to work. Moreover, the apartment is unfurnished, which means that the tenant would be able to choose their own furniture and decor, allowing them to personalize their living space. These are just a few of the features that make this apartment stand out and justify a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for explaining the unique selling points of the apartment, Mister Schmidt. I can see that the location and the amenities do add significant value. Taking these into account, I am willing to increase my offer to €800 per month. I believe this reflects the quality and convenience of the apartment. What do you think?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Ms. Müller, your offer of €800 per month is still too low for this apartment. I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer, but I must inform you that this is not the price I am looking for. This apartment is in high demand, and I am confident that I can find a tenant who is willing to pay a higher price. I am willing to negotiate, but I expect a more substantial increase in your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are looking for a higher price, Mister Schmidt. I am also aware that the apartment is in high demand, which is why I am here, ready to negotiate. I respect your time and the quality of the property. Therefore, I am ready to make another offer. How about €850 per month? I believe this is a fair and competitive price that reflects the market value of the apartment. What is your opinion on this new offer?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Ms. Müller, your offer of €850 per month is a step in the right direction, but it is still not the price I am looking for. I appreciate your efforts to reach a fair agreement, but I must inform you that this offer is not yet satisfactory. I am willing to continue negotiating, but I expect a higher offer that reflects the quality and desirability of this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I respect your position, Mister Schmidt. To show my commitment to reaching a fair agreement, I am prepared to make another offer. How about €900 per month? This offer takes into account the location, amenities, and the fact that the apartment is unfurnished, allowing for personal customization. I believe this is a very competitive price that values the apartment appropriately. What is your response to this new offer?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Ms. Müller, your offer of €900 per month is a significant improvement, and I am pleased to see that you are willing to meet my expectations. However, I must inform you that this offer is still not the price I am looking for. This apartment is in high demand, and I am confident that I can find a tenant who is willing to pay a higher price. I am willing to continue negotiating, but I expect a higher offer that reflects the quality and desirability of this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are seeking a higher price, Mister Schmidt. To reflect the desirability of the apartment, I am prepared to make one final offer. How about €950 per month? This offer takes into account the prime location, the quality of construction, and the unfurnished status, which provides flexibility for the tenant. I believe this is a very competitive price that values the apartment appropriately and reflects the market demand. What is your response to this new offer?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Ms. Müller, your offer of €950 per month is a substantial improvement, and I am pleased to see that you are willing to meet my expectations. This offer is very close to the price that I am looking for. However, I must inform you that this offer is still not the price I am looking for. I am willing to continue negotiating, but I expect a higher offer that reflects the quality and desirability of this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are seeking a price that fully reflects the quality and desirability of the apartment, Mister Schmidt. However, I am a student and need to consider my budget carefully. After careful consideration, I am prepared to make my final offer. How about €975 per month? This offer represents my maximum budget for the apartment, taking into account all its attributes. I believe this is a fair and competitive price that values the apartment appropriately. What is your response to this final offer?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Ms. Müller, your final offer of €975 per month is very close to the price that I am looking for. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept your offer. Therefore, I agree to the price of €975 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Wonderful news, Mister Schmidt! I am very pleased to hear that we have reached an agreement on the rental price. Your acceptance of €975 per month is a testament to the fair negotiation we have conducted. I am confident that this will be a mutually beneficial arrangement. Thank you for your time and consideration. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
